Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='MH02')

BibliographicData.Title: Thalamic relay nuclei of the basal ganglia form both reciprocal and nonreciprocal cortical connections, linking multiple frontal cortical areas.
